Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that a Nigerian man hacked the US government and gave his family and friends permanent citizenship.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible sources provided to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Nigerian man mentioned in the story actually hacked the US government and granted citizenship, without providing any evidence or proof.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no record of a person named Abaeze Atuche on the list of 80 Nigerians who were arrested by the FBI.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the story originated from a South African parody website, indicating that it may not be true.
